title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education          Ocmulgee is a sacred place to many Americans. The park is a great place for school children to come to experience 17,000 years of continuous human history. We offer fields trips to school groups and travel trunks for teachers to take into their classrooms. Click on the Park as Classrooms link to find out more.   Parks as Classrooms-Teaching materials  Suggested Reading-Read lists for teachers
